details.sectionContent: This workshop will teach you how to build your own self balancing robot.
In this workshop participants will be taught how to make a robot, which will balance itself.
This workshop involves the creation of a self-balancing robot. It also helps participants to understand the underlying concepts and using custom control board and Gyroscope module.

Students will gain practical hands on experience with the following components.
‣	Custom development board, Gyroscope.
Participants will also be made familiar with step by step development of robot and establishment of communication.

‣	Robot development components
‣	Embedded robotics development board
‣	Batteries
‣	Tools
